channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: National Guard members from Texas are in Illinois in Trump’s latest move to send troops to cities
item.description: National Guard members from Texas are at an Army Reserve center in Illinois. It’s the most visible sign yet of the Trump administration’s plan to deploy troops to the Chicago area despite a lawsuit and vigorous opposition from Democratic elected leaders.

item.title: What we know about National Guard deployment in Chicago and Oregon
Motorists lift medical helicopter to rescue woman after crash injuring 3 on California highway
